name: CongressNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill makes news on the 115th United States Congress available through Alexa by giving you direct access to POLITICO's Congress feed. It's never been easier to be in the loop on both House and Senate. Empower yourself and your loved ones to hold our elected officials accountable! Simply enable this skill and ask: "Alexa, what's in the news?"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
